程序包 com.example.eventlink_qr_pro

类 AdminActivityUITest

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlink_qr_pro.AdminActivityUITest
public class AdminActivityUITest extends Object
Tests for the AdminActivity UI, verifying the correct navigation actions from the admin dashboard to different sections of the app, including viewing events, profiles, and images. These tests utilize Espresso for UI interactions and assertions, and Intents for verifying intent-based navigations.

This class ensures that the appropriate activities are launched when the corresponding buttons are clicked in the AdminActivity interface.

    方法
    说明
    void
    setUp()
    Sets up Intents before each test.
    void
    tearDown()
    Cleans up and releases Intents after each test to avoid any potential IllegalStateExceptions in subsequent tests.
    void
    testNavigateToViewEvents()
    Verifies navigation to the View Events screen from the Admin dashboard.
    void
    testNavigateToViewImages()
    Confirms navigation to the View Images section, checking that the appropriate intent is initiated when the View Images button is clicked in the Admin dashboard.
    void
    testNavigateToViewProfiles()
    Tests navigation to the View Profiles screen, ensuring the correct activity is started upon clicking the View Profiles button in the Admin dashboard.

  • 字段详细资料

    • activityRule

      public androidx.test.ext.junit.rules.ActivityScenarioRule<AdminActivity> activityRule
      Initializes AdminActivity before each test method. This rule ensures that the activity is launched and terminated according to the lifecycle of the test, providing a fresh instance for every test method.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • AdminActivityUITest

      public AdminActivityUITest()

  • 方法详细资料

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Sets up Intents before each test. This is necessary for testing Android Intents and ensuring that the correct activity transitions are happening.

    • tearDown

      public void tearDown()
      Cleans up and releases Intents after each test to avoid any potential IllegalStateExceptions in subsequent tests.

    • testNavigateToViewEvents

      public void testNavigateToViewEvents()
      Verifies navigation to the View Events screen from the Admin dashboard. Asserts that the correct intent is launched when the View Events button is clicked.

    • testNavigateToViewProfiles

      public void testNavigateToViewProfiles()
      Tests navigation to the View Profiles screen, ensuring the correct activity is started upon clicking the View Profiles button in the Admin dashboard.

    • testNavigateToViewImages

      public void testNavigateToViewImages()
      Confirms navigation to the View Images section, checking that the appropriate intent is initiated when the View Images button is clicked in the Admin dashboard.
